title: Client issues
body: dear rito, can you fix the old client and not just care for the new one? both clients always crash and i lose lp just because of it. its annoying to deal with and id like to see a hotfix for it please. thanks rito games :))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))

replies.body: Are you getting any error messages while getting these crashes?  When is it happening?  Would like to help, but need more details.  Let me know!

yea everytime i launch the client bugsplat pops up but it still launches, and the neew client makes me lag in game which is pretty lame, and with the new post http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/client-beta-update-2-replacing-legacy-client-1 not very happy ;(

It sounds like something is blocking your client from launching, so it can't grab game files it needs to load.  Try the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help as well as looking into your anti-virus settings in case any updates is blocking it.  I hope that can help and lighten things up for you!
